title: Environment Install: Failure Corrupts Python

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
Spack Environment: if one adds a couple of packages, one of them `python`, and the `spack install` fails then the environment will be corrupted because spack tries to take the new (not yet installed) python

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack env create test
spack env activate test
spack add py-h5py
spack add hdf5
spack add mpi
spack add python

spack install # fails on h5py no being HDF5 1.12.0 compatible

spack add hdf5@1.10.6
# uauaauauuaa nothing works anymore
spack --help
# aua aua
```

### Error Message

<!-- If Spack reported an error, provide the error message. If it did not report an error but the output appears incorrect, provide the incorrect output. If there was no error message and no output but the result is incorrect, describe how it does not match what you expect. -->
```console
spack --help
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/axel/src/spack/bin/spack", line 64, in <module>
    sys.exit(spack.main.main())
  File "/home/axel/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 704, in main
    ev.activate(env, args.use_env_repo)
  File "/home/axel/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/environment.py", line 163, in activate
    cmds += env.add_default_view_to_shell(shell)
  File "/home/axel/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/environment.py", line 1107, in add_default_view_to_shell
    spec, self.default_view))
  File "/home/axel/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/user_environment.py", line 89, in environment_modifications_for_spec
    spec.package.setup_run_environment(env)
  File "/home/axel/src/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/python/package.py", line 742, in setup_run_environment
  File "/home/axel/src/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/python/package.py", line 709, in headers
  File "/home/axel/src/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/python/package.py", line 599, in get_config_h_filename
  File "/home/axel/src/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/python/package.py", line 556, in command
RuntimeError: Unable to locate python command in /home/axel/src/spack/var/spack/environments/test/.spack-env/view/bin
```
